ext.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf980daa263b661ab8ddee7d4fd833c7da7e7995e2c359ff1f17e67e4112f2236","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7448ab095d6940130bcf76ba47a2eab14148c83119523b93dd89f6d84edd6c02","dweb:/ipfs/QmawrZ4voKQjH3oomXT3Kuheb3Mnmo2VvVpxg8Ne5UJUrd"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e8778b14317ba9e256c30a76fd6c32b960af621987f56069e1e819c77c6a133","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1777404f1dcd0fac188e55a288724ec3c67b45288e49cc64723e95e702b49ab8","dweb:/ipfs/QmZFdC626GButBApwDUvvTnUzdinevC3B24d7yyh57XkiA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4296879f55019b23e135000eb36896057e7101fb7fb859c5ef690cf14643757b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://87b3541437c8c443ccd36795e56a338ed12855eec17f8da624511b8d1a7e14df","dweb:/ipfs/QmeJQCtZrQjtJLr6u7ZHWeH3pBnjtLWzvRrKViAi7UZqxL"]},"src/L2/Airdrop.sol":{"keccak256":"0x78fdc7f8482e967fa7ca08397319550932389d44f00bef5e3600bea7aab7fcff","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e3df1e5f513b3ae0a6e6973c370e5c22f638d03e0a0a8b98815cceecf9606b47","dweb:/ipfs/QmUhZXMeJ96pRqw8Fcyk9UuV36yG57Ydjx8kYbmmgmjUrw"]},"src/L2/AirdropStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa4006065843f61d23a8279f85f37dfda12abb36d4ccdacf0c1c054339723b8fd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://984caa7b6dae2ec10e4e4e71d7c4bbf8d6feb1a2a0fe55ef28a0897291b378f2","dweb:/ipfs/QmUWUQu7thTwNs4mbAtkoBvJpHxu89V74CHEnpS4Xff9HH"]},"src/L2/GemFactoryStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc826b08803c7ecf7764156fc65c5336c0803e595054d66bf1490eb4214bda875","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://deb688d131278d07a36662baed9c5ed10e754de5c1acdf9ba71d474a0f5036d9","dweb:/ipfs/Qmc9fy2qCRsy6d2tikUXxwnepHboBMmxYZzAqzMe1vaPe4"]},"src/common/AuthControl.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbe41cff50ff7761fd4e26ac29efbb6d1f8502509e58f90a45994f81762c081cd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bdbc6e16cd3896232c6ca672a46347a41fca21bf2b31152f92c157bf91bf3120","dweb:/ipfs/QmPUYBx9AvuAF8RtJqtZQETuiLLnkmKJ68fY2suKhxMdtP"]},"src/common/AuthRole.sol":{"keccak256":"0x592c1b768ffede0825cab31fd7cd5a3d8ffe7f68adce5fa0136b16c920df739b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://68cb4436b7ac4193979db957e618838d7eb8375a60e7004cc5af36e761461a7d","dweb:/ipfs/QmW3KeKShqoo9apw8BeHaLMMkUpfsV6wNfzcNKgL24KgcJ"]},"src/interfaces/IGemFactory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x13684a427a7edcc76e8dde9f48954d8c2359a467c64c68c32efc6c51e4dad334","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://682ba78b3cad89421e2fcc895935bb5f6e2c9d9c027ca2b37cfa2efa2341e3ec","dweb:/ipfs/QmZPBD4XmBeYutymXvpzGx6vNifBM5zNMQraNKUUW8RFsD"]},"src/proxy/ProxyStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0x412d993265a6f20779b0cfcbc0c132aa580e183438eb5208e4deef671702b335","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://166e5b647c08fd63d023032fb08937879b30b2f39ec872ecca37178d28da8a88","dweb:/ipfs/QmSF2beNGV8edN6Mh7F97ogmDAUS2RPmGiPVJDvoWUGnJx"]}},"version":1}

assignGemForAirdrop(uint256[],address).details: Can only be called by the owner or an admin. Ensures tokens are unique and owned by the treasury.

params._to: The address of the user to receive the airdrop.
params._tokenIds: The list of GEM token IDs to assign.

claimAirdrop().details: Transfers ownership of each GEM token to the caller. Can only be called when not paused.

clearEligibleTokensList().details: Can only be called by the owner or an admin.

returns._0: The address of the gem factory.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params._address: The address to query for eligible tokens.

returns._0: An array of token IDs eligible for airdrop.
A boolean indicating if the user has claimed their airdrop.
An array of addresses of users with eligible tokens.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

returns._0: A boolean indicating if the user has eligible tokens.

initialize(address,address).details: Can only be called once. Grants the default admin role to the caller.

params._gemFactory: The address of the gem factory contract.
params._treasury: The address of the treasury contract.

returns._0: A boolean indicating if the contract has been initialized.
A boolean indicating if the contract is paused.

pause().details: Can only be called by the owner when the contract is not paused.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

unpause().details: Can only be called by the owner when the contract is paused.

assignGemForAirdrop(uint256[],address).notice: Assigns a list of GEM tokens to a user for airdrop.

claimAirdrop().notice: Claims the airdrop of GEM tokens assigned to the caller.

clearEligibleTokensList().notice: Clears all tokens eligible for airdrop for all users.

getGemFactory().notice: Returns the address of the gem factory.

getTokensEligible(address).notice: Returns the list of GEM tokens eligible for airdrop for a given address.

getTreasury().notice: Returns the address of the treasury.

getUserClaimed(address).notice: Returns whether a user has claimed their airdrop.

getUsersWithEligibleTokens().notice: Returns the list of users with eligible tokens.

hasEligibleTokens(address).notice: Returns whether a user has eligible tokens.

initialize(address,address).notice: Initializes the contract with the treasury and gem factory addresses.

isInitialized().notice: Returns whether the contract has been initialized.

isPaused().notice: Returns whether the contract is paused.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing actions to be performed.
